```{r}
#Loading libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
#install.packages("groupdata2")
library(groupdata2) 

#install.packages("janitor")
library(janitor)
```




```{r PLOTTING}
# Plotting data:
df %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x=id_in_group, y=time_spent) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  theme_classic()



ggplot(data=df, aes(x=time_spent)) + 
      geom_bar(aes(y = ..prop.., fill = success), position = "dodge")+
  facet_wrap(.~id_in_group)+
  theme_linedraw()



```
